pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Linear Regression // The optimal linear regression olr(), runs all the possible combinations of linear regression equations. The olr() returns the equation that has the greatest adjusted R-squared term or the greatest R-squared term. Essentially, the olr() returns the best fit equation out of all the possible equations. Complimentary functions are included which list all of the equations, all of the equations in ascending order, a function to give the user a specific model's summary, and the list of adjusted R-squared terms R-squared terms. Also, a 'Python' version is available at: https://pypi.org/project/olr/.
